description.main: An exceptional living environment for those who dream of escaping everyday life and reconnecting with what matters most, the Fõresta project offers the opportunity to live in a home at the heart of nature. This new neighborhood is located 5 km from Highway 10 (A-10), 15 minutes from downtown Granby, and within reach of a wide range of services and activities. Outdoor enthusiasts will be delighted.

footer.signature: FÖRESTA is a project by Les Constructions Dominic Cyr inc.
